situation.title: Hygiene recommendations for children and students
situation.meta_description: Hygiene recommendations for children and students.

content.processed:
Recommendation

 

To best prevent the spread of coronavirus, it is important to follow the rule: Face mask, hand sanitation, social distance.

Wearing a face mask (over your mouth and nose) is one of the most effective prevention against coronavirus infection. A face mask is effective only if it covers the entire area of ​​the nose and mouth. The face mask must be worn indoors, but also in villages and towns. Learn how to handle a face mask safely in the Face masks section.

Another important prevention is frequent and thorough hand washing and the use of disinfection. In this way, you can prevent the infection from getting into your body (mostly mouth, nose, and eyes) from your hands, from where the virus can then spread to your body.

It is also important to keep a gap in a place with a higher concentration of people. The recommended distance you should keep is 2 meters.

All these methods of prevention protect not only you but also your loved ones, parents, grandparents, and other people who could fall into the risk category for whom the coronavirus is particularly dangerous.
